Reviews.Title: One of the best i ever had !
Reviews.Author: TA-21
Reviews.Content: The best of Thinkpad T series i love to use it all the time if you want to have better a better speed with all thinkpad T series choose their HDD type to SSD (Memory)

Reviews.Title: Verticle bar in monitor 2 times in row, Lenovo will not pay to fix it
Reviews.Author: Irene Innes
Reviews.Content: We own a Lenovo T410s 2901CTO. When the computer was almost a year old, we started to see a verticle bar in on the screen. We were able to use the bezel (see link below) to get rid of it at first. Within a month or two, the bezel did no good. We replaced the screen, and the same thing happened within 9 months. You will have to pay to fix this defect if it happens after your warranty has expired. We will NEVER buy another Lenovo after this experience. For more information, see the following links: [...][...]
